mapper.select: SELECT class_id FROM user_reservation WHERE user_id = #{userId} and cancel_flag = 0

SELECT UR.*, CTY.class_type_name, CTY.class_name, CP.class_point_name, II.instructor_name, CT.class_start_time, CT.class_end_time, CI.class_date FROM user_reservation AS UR INNER JOIN post.class_info AS CI ON UR.class_id = CI.id INNER JOIN post.class_type AS CTY ON CI.class_type_id = CTY.id INNER JOIN post.class_point AS CP ON CI.class_point_id = CP.id INNER JOIN post.class_time AS CT ON CI.class_time_id = CT.id INNER JOIN post.instructor_info AS II ON CI.instructor_id = II.id WHERE UR.user_id = #{userId} and UR.cancel_flag = 0 ORDER BY CI.class_date LIMIT 3
